content:
These are the user quotes, include them 3 archetypes you have built: 
“The website feels like a scam and not secure at all. Had my check-up twice if this was the right website. I need more trust to be shown to me.” - Skeptical
(Non-designer) “The typography is awful and had me feeling a little overwhelmed, even if the information was simple.” - Overwhelmed
“I didn’t know where to find some of the stuff that they were asking for. What is the Equipment Number???” - Frustrated
“I felt lost at one point.” - Overwhelemed
“I Couldn’t go back, as I needed to verify/change something.” - Frustatred
“I don’t know where the fuck I am, how I am supposed to know which office to go to?” - Overwhelmed
“Can’t they simple point what the most suitable location for me?” - Overwhelmed
“There was a button saying confirm, and I thought I was done, suddenly there was more asked from me. It felt like a lot for a form.” - Overwhelmed 
“I rather do it online than in person, but while drinking some coffee, because of a long time, it takes me to find and fill this.” - Frustated
“The language not being accessible, and the visual disorder isn’t empathic at all with us. Making it harder to navigate.” - Frustrated and Overwhelmed
“I would like to be ensured that they are helping me, some sort of feedback or empathy behind this. A way to reach out for help.” - Overwhelmed
